definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to rule according to the law

sentences.english: Those whose act constitutes a crime shall be prosecuted for their criminal liability.
sentences.chinese: 对构成犯罪的，依法追究其刑事责任。

sentences.english: Land acquisition and demolition of illegal behavior, according to the law severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 对违法违规征地拆迁行为，依法依规严肃查处。

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, he shall be transferred to the department of justice and subject to criminal liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 构成犯罪的，依法移交司法机关追究其刑事责任。

sentences.english: The man who murdered his wife was executed according to law.
sentences.chinese: 那个杀妻犯被依法处决了。

sentences.english: If the case is serious enough to constitute a crime, criminal responsibility shall be affixed.
sentences.chinese: 构成犯罪的，依法追究刑事责任。

sentences.english: The measurement devices used in hydrologic monitoring shall pass the inspection according to law.
sentences.chinese: 水文监测所使用的计量器具应当依法经检定合格。

sentences.english: On the one hand, those who make them must be severely punished by the law.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，制假者必须依法严惩。

sentences.english: A securities company must undertake its self-operated business by using its own capital and lawfully raised funds.
sentences.chinese: 自营业务必须使用自有资金和依法筹集的资金。

sentences.english: The pertinent self-disciplinary organizations shall conduct self-disciplinary administration on the introduction business in pursuance of the law.
sentences.chinese: 相关自律性构造依法对介绍营业勾当履行自律管理。

sentences.english: He punished in accordance with the law, known as the "generation of Xingming phase."
sentences.chinese: 他依法惩处，被称为“一代刑名之相”。

sentences.english: He is subject to criminal liabilities according to law.
sentences.chinese: 被依法追究刑事责任的。

sentences.english: The land belongs legally to the Government.
He said that rule by law is a fundamental strategy of China.
sentences.chinese: 他说，依法治国是中国的基本方略。

sentences.english: If tampers with the manuscript to originate arbitrarily, this net will hold responsible legally.
sentences.chinese: 如擅自篡改稿件来源，本网将依法追究责任。

sentences.english: Article 58 When a privately-run school is to be terminated, it shall make financial settlement according to law.
sentences.chinese: 第五十八条民办学校终止时，应当依法进行财务清算。

sentences.english: We have resolutely banned the organization according to law and taken measures against its top leaders.
sentences.chinese: 我们依法坚决取缔，特别是坚决打击其首要分子。
